page.title: 19WILLOUGHBY NEWS
page.content: Recently the village shop and post office of Willoughby-on-the-Wolds was broken into by an{armed man}who knocked on the front door of the owners' of the post office's house and demanded the money from the post office. The lady, Mrs Ritz, hit the intruder and he hit Mr Ritz but then he ran away empty-handed. Every year in Willoughby they hold a {Fete.}This year though they had a fancy dress comepition and quite a lot of children took part.There was a marching band and a trailer which all the children who took part went on.Also there was a BMX display on the tennis court.All sorts of stalls were there and cream teas.There was a lucky dip and a toy stall but unfortunately the rain came and wet everything.Some people went on the stocks and got soaking wet.
